other_title: Eien no Aseria: The Spirit of Eternity Sword (Japanese)
plot: Yuto Takamine and his younger sister-in-law Kaori, were at their parents' grave, when they were suddenly summoned into another world, Phantasmagoria. The King and a woman named Restina took Kaori as a hostage, and ordered Yuto to fight against their enemies. Then, the King gave him a sword called “Motome” to protect their kingdom from enemy spirits. Kaori will only be freed if Yuto helps protect Phantasmagoria. Thus, Yuto's journey begins...
ending_theme: "Eien no Aseria -Opening Theme-" by Kawamura Yumi (ep 01)
